Name: Hypnosis Reveries
About the game: Based on the Jessien's interdisciplinary research in VR related fields over the past decade, HYPNOSIS REVERIES takes an abstract and minimalist approach to tell a story about growing. Through a 20-minute exploration experience, you will step into a mental maze, looking back at the important moments that changed you, and see yourself again. *HYPNOSIS REVERIES is originally a large-space VR experience using a redirected walking algorithm invented by Jessien. *The current version available on Steam is a remade version, supporting Standing and Sitting modes.
Meta Title: Hypnosis Reveries: May 20, 2022, Jessien and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Hypnosis Reveries? Check out the release date (May 20, 2022), developer insights from Jessien, and a complete game summary.
